projects.title: Fast image editor
projects.label: Personal
projects.description: A fast and efficent web-based image editor that uses *Rust* (WebAssembly) for fast image manipulation performance. The editor offers a range of features, including resizing, cropping, blurring, sharpening, edge detection, and more.
